author: inugent
body:
Hello,  
  This pull request contains to modifications:
1) the addition of DQMHelper to allow are sumw2 to be used to correct the stats in the RelVal. This should fix the statistics problem in the RelVal comparison plots.
2) Turning off the unused features in the TauValidation to allow for running on AODSim (ie the hepmc collection and weights)
Best regards,
Ian
title: Patch for RelVal Statistics (sumw2) and to run TauValidation on AODSIM
